entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 11 except plus 5 along parts of the coast. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon.
